so_8886683: read -u 3

exec 3<file.txt
while read -u 3 line; do
    echo $line
    read userInput
    echo "$line $userInput"
done

while read line <&3; do
    echo $line
    read userInput
    echo "$line $userInput"
done 3<file.txt

so_13754746: #!/bin/bash
CONFIG='/etc/samba/smb.conf'
for i in homes music; do
    echo "$i"
    sed -n '/\['$i'\]/,/\[/{/^\[.*$/!p}' $CONFIG | while read -r line; do
        printf "%-15s : %s\n" "${line%?=*}" "${line#*=?}"
    done
done

homes
browsable  : no
map archive : yes
music
browsable  : yes
read only  : yes
path       : /usr/local/samba/tmp
